title: Prologue to a Supposed Play - poem best described

content.question: The poem is best described as

choices.label: an extended reflection on the nature of comedy
a passionate monologue about the nobility of human nature
a comical complaint about the shortcomings of playwrights
an idiosyncratic description of a canonical play

content.answer: an extended reflection on the nature of comedy

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
